amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit any funds made available by this Act from being used to dismantle, demolish, remove, or damage, barriers placed by State governments along the United States-Mexico border.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
